short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrate openAI models to let you summarize text smarter and from any web!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing our Smart Summarizer! Smart Summarizer is designed to help you quickly and easily summarize any English text from any website! With it, you can save time and energy by quickly obtaining a summary of any document you need to read, without having to read through the entire document yourself.
